page.title: 20Gala Day at Fletchertown.
page.content: Nearly every year at Fletchertown we have a Gala Sports Day on the recreation ground,opposite our school.These are some of the races we take part in;a sack race,when you have to get into a sack and hop to the finishing line:an egg and spoon race, when you put an egg(usually wooden or pot)onto a spoon and holding it in one hand,(with the other behind your back) you race to the finishing line,trying not to drop the egg!If you come first you get 75p and for second place you get 50p. There are races for children and grown-ups. When all the races are finished we have a sandwich,a packet of crisps,a chocolate biscuit and a drink of pop.In the evening a disco is held in the youth club hut for all the children. The event is organised by parents in the village. We usually have a great afternoon.
